body.p: ∏ provides a complete framework and tools to rapidly build a graphical user interface for your application. Using tools like the GUI Painter, building a graphical interface is accomplished by placing widgets on a canvas, and generating code for their behavior.
Help topics address the basics of how to create window specifications, connecting widgets to your domain model, customizing view classes, and working with resources such as images, icons, and menus.
For more complete documentation, refer to the GUI Developer's Guide.
